name: Mata Hari
skill: Decreases DMG dealt by a random enemy by 78%/99% for a extended time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the most famous female spy in the world. She lures her targets with seductive dances in order to extract top secret information. Her job has become so much harder now that she's gotten so famous, but she's been doing a fine job nonetheless. After taking time off to focus on a side job, returning to missions has filled her with motivation.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Event: Defeat LVL 10, 20, 30 Forge Washington.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Event: Random drops after LVL 10.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Get a First and Second Half Ranking of 6001~10000.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Get a Total Ranking of 7501~10000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" event.
◦ She is heavily implied to be Nickel Elf throughout the "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" event.

main: "I have no intention of letting my powers grow dull."
skill: "I will find out your deepest secrets..."
summon: "I suppose I can allow you to help out."
limit_break: "Just give me the sign and I'm ready for action."
